detailedDesc: Part kestrel, part bear, part wolf.  Parts is parts, and makes an ugly whole. Part kestrel, part bear, part wolf.  Parts is parts, and makes an ugly whole.

longDesc: The greatest swordsman in the land is standing here with a sneer on his face.
detailedDesc: This is the ultimate swordsman. This is the ultimate swordsman.

longDesc: The Mummy of Rabscuttle wanders here, hands aloft, walking towards you.
detailedDesc: All bandages, no personality. All bandages, no personality.
This scaly creature looks like it is well adapted to its underground This scaly creature looks like it is well adapted to its underground habitat.  He looks very powerful.

longDesc: General Woundwort, the dark demon of Minos, awaits to maul you to shreds.
detailedDesc: He looks vaguely like a rabbit, but sure doesn't act like one. He looks vaguely like a rabbit, but sure doesn't act like one.

longDesc: Franz, Minos' henchman, is here ready to pump you up.
detailedDesc: Franz is no girlie man.  He is very muscular and looks as if he could Franz is no girlie man.  He is very muscular and looks as if he could squeeze your head like a grapefruit.

longDesc: Hanz is here flexing his muscles and squeezing grapefruits.
detailedDesc: Hanz is no girlie man.  He is very muscular and looks as if he could Hanz is no girlie man.  He is very muscular and looks as if he could lift a large dragon.

longDesc: King Minos the Minotaur is ready and waiting to gore you to death.
detailedDesc: He smells something awful. He smells something awful.

longDesc: A large dragon turtle breaks the surface churning the water into huge waves.
detailedDesc: The turtle's shell is the size of a small house and looks as hard as rock. The turtle's shell is the size of a small house and looks as hard as rock.

longDesc: You notice the face of an ugly hag in the sea weeds.
detailedDesc: The sea hag is terribly fightful and has razor sharp teeth. The sea hag is terribly fightful and has razor sharp teeth.

longDesc: There is a merman swimming here brandishing his trident at you!
detailedDesc: The merman has a powerful tail fin instead of legs. The merman has a powerful tail fin instead of legs.

longDesc: A crusty looking crab is crawling around here searching for food.
detailedDesc: It looks like a crab... what more can be said? It looks like a crab... what more can be said?
